name: .SPUB File Extension
summary: Learn about .SPUB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: CD/DVD label or jewel case insert created with Disc Cover software; allows covers and labels for CDs and DVDs to be created easily and accurately printed; SPUB files may also be label or cover templates included with the software program.

content: Disc Cover is developed specifically for Mac OS X and can import data from the Finder, iTunes, iPhoto, and iDVD.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
